description: This source file implements various functions related to processing HTTP requests and responses, specifically for a Web Virtual Host Object. It includes functions for query handling, processing requests, notifying events, constructing responses, adding response headers, and obtaining resource paths, all within the context of a web server infrastructure.

methods.name: ULONG WebVhoQuery(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hBmoReq,ANSC_HANDLE hBmoRep,PANSC_HANDLE phQueryContext)
methods.description: Examines a web request message to determine the appropriate HTTP response status code, managing resource path resolution and resource owner lookup.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS WebVhoProcess(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hBmoReq,ANSC_HANDLE hBmoRep,ANSC_HANDLE hQueryContext)
methods.description: Handles the processing of a web request message, including session management, processing the resource, and adding headers to the response.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS WebVhoNotify(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hBmoReq,ULONG ulEvent)
methods.description: Processes web request events, primarily for session activity tracking.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS WebVhoConstructResponse(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hBmoReq,ANSC_HANDLE hBmoRep,ULONG ulStatusCode)
methods.description: Constructs an HTTP response with the specified status code, setting the reason phrase and response information.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS WebVhoAddHttpRepHeaders(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hBmoRep)
methods.description: Adds standard and session-related headers to an HTTP response, such as cookies for session management.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS WebVhoGetResourcePath(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hBmoReq,ANSC_HANDLE hTokenChain,BOOL bReferred)
methods.description: Builds the resource URI path based on the request URI, referer, and host headers, supporting absolute and relative paths.
